attributes.action: Anti Gun and Knife crime Bristol
attributes.additional_details:
Gun and Knife crime is such a huge issue up and down the Uk, so why has none of our 3 main political parties in Government got a policy on tackling gun and knife crime.
So if you believe that the UK government should be writing a policy and taking serious action on Gun and knife please sign this petition, this is for everyone to sign no matter where you are thank you for your support.
Narraser Gordon
